::Battera::

She smiled. "Good idea."  She fired her optic lazars at Shockaract.
She flew up and over the heads of Rex and Firearm. She flew up and 
fired again at Shockaract.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex/Firearm::
> 
> Rex swears when he sees the two others (Battera and Hakibuscon) 
arrive, 
> ducking down and pressing a few buttons on his wrist comp, ordering 
the 
> defences not to fire on the two. He looks at Shockaract, firing 
another shot 
> at him from his heavy-fire rifle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm grins at Battera. "How about 'kill him'?" he says, firing 
his arm 
> cannon at Shockaract, the cannon set on heavy-fire.
